document_data.name: the Temple of the Small Axe
document_data.mainbody: The '''Temple of the Small Axe''' was a mosque dedicated to [[Kor]] in [[Liham]], in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: The temple had a golden dome that dominated the city-scape of Liham. The main altar for the temple lay in the center of a beautiful garden.
document_data.Location: The Temple of the Small Axe was situated across the street from the [[Palace of Sly Ravens]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The priests of Kor inhabiting the temple were all [[pragmatist]]s.
